verses.plain: The heavens declare the glory of God; and the firmament sheweth his handywork.

tokens.t: The heavens declare the glory of God; and the firmament sheweth his handywork.

verses.plain: Day unto day uttereth speech, and night unto night sheweth knowledge.

tokens.t: Day unto day uttereth speech, and night unto night sheweth knowledge.

verses.plain: There is no speech nor language, where their voice is not heard.
Their line is gone out through all the earth, and their words to the end of the world. In them hath he set a tabernacle for the sun,

tokens.t: Their line is gone out through all the earth, and their words to the end of the world. In them hath he set a tabernacle for the sun,

verses.plain: Which is as a bridegroom coming out of his chamber, and rejoiceth as a strong man to run a race.

tokens.t: as a bridegroom coming out of his chamber,
rejoiceth as a strong man to run a race.

verses.plain: His going forth is from the end of the heaven, and his circuit unto the ends of it: and there is nothing hid from the heat thereof.

tokens.t: from the end of the heaven, and his circuit unto the ends of it: and there is nothing hid from the heat thereof.

verses.plain: The law of the LORD is perfect, converting the soul: the testimony of the LORD is sure, making wise the simple.

tokens.t: perfect, converting the soul: the testimony of the

verses.plain: The statutes of the LORD are right, rejoicing the heart: the commandment of the LORD is pure, enlightening the eyes.

tokens.t: right, rejoicing the heart: the commandment of the

verses.plain: The fear of the LORD is clean, enduring for ever: the judgments of the LORD are true and righteous altogether.

tokens.t: clean, enduring for ever: the judgments of the

verses.plain: More to be desired are they than gold, yea, than much fine gold: sweeter also than honey and the honeycomb.

tokens.t: than gold, yea, than much fine gold: sweeter also than honey and the honeycomb.

verses.plain: Moreover by them is thy servant warned: and in keeping of them there is great reward.

tokens.t: Moreover by them is thy servant warned:

verses.plain: Who can understand his errors? cleanse thou me from secret faults.

tokens.t: errors? cleanse thou me from secret

verses.plain: Keep back thy servant also from presumptuous sins; let them not have dominion over me: then shall I be upright, and I shall be innocent from the great transgression.

tokens.t: Keep back thy servant also from presumptuous
let them not have dominion over me: then shall I be upright, and I shall be innocent from the great transgression.

verses.plain: Let the words of my mouth, and the meditation of my heart, be acceptable in thy sight, O LORD, my strength, and my redeemer.

tokens.t: Let the words of my mouth, and the meditation of my heart, be acceptable in thy sight, O

footnotes.text: where…: or, without these their voice is heard: Heb. without their voice heard
the honeycomb: Heb. the dropping of honeycombs
